video_info.title: 10 min Full Body Stretch Routine in Bed | for flexibility, peace & calm
video_info.description:

transcript.text: hi guys today I am going to show you my
favorite 10 minutes full body stretch
routine that I do every day you can do
it on the med or in the comfort of your
own bed not only does it improve
flexibility range of motion it also
enhance blood circulation relieves
tension and stiffness reduce aches and
pains and also relax the body and mind
you can do this in the morning or at
night to unwind and if you're ready
let's stretch
let's begin with some gentle neck
rotations 3 2 1 start slowly Circle your
neck allowing the stiffness to melt away
with each
[Music]
rotation change direction in three
2 one feel the release in your muscles
as you let go of any
[Music]
tightness 3 2 1 now ease into a next
side
[Music]
stretch 3 2 one start tilt your head
towards your shoulder feeling a gentle
stretch along the opposite side of your
neck then tilt your head up to stretch
our neck in all
[Music]
angles 3 2 one other side this helps to
further relieve any strain in your neck
area enhancing your sense of peace
[Music]
3 2 1 next let's transition into a side
stretch 3 2 1 start reach one arm
overhead and lean to the opposite side
3 2 1 change
[Music]
side breathe in as you expand with
calmness
[Music]
3 2 1 moving on to a sitting
[Music]
twist 3 2 1 start cross your legs turn
your torso
[Music]
gently 3 2 1 other side this is perfect
for releasing lower back tension and
improving digestion bringing you a sense
of internal
[Music]
balance 3 2
1 fifth butterfly stretch
[Music]
3 2 1 start bring your feet together and
let your knees fall to the
[Music]
sides you can lean forward with back
flat for a deeper hip opening stretch
[Music]
3 2 1 progress to a lunge stretch to
open up your hips and stretch your
thighs 3 2 1 start sit lower for more
stretch
[Music]
3 2 1 change leg
[Music]
3 2 1 next a hamstring
[Music]
stretch 3 2 1 start extend one leg and
lean forward gently keep your back
straight
[Music]
3 2 one other leg allow the stretch to
deepen naturally enhancing your
[Music]
flexibility 3 2 1 lie down for the hip
stretch
3 2 one start cross one foot over the
opposite knee and pull your leg
[Music]
in 3 2 one switch leg release any
tightness and stress held in the hips
[Music]
3 2 1 transitioning into body
twist 3 2 1 start lying down bent one
knee and bring it to OPP P aside extend
your arms
Out 3 2 one other side let the twist
release tension in the spine relax and
bring Clarity to the mind
[Music]
3 2 1 moving into quad
stretch 3 2 one start pull one heel
below your glute the other leg Bend up
[Music]
3 2 1 switch
leg feeling a nice stretch along the
quads 3 2 1 now up for ab stretch
[Music]
3 2 1 start lie on your belly push and
lift your upper body as you extend your
arms opening up your chest and
[Music]
UPS you can look to each side for a
stretch along the side ABS breathe in
and breathe out as you release the
[Music]
tension 3 2 1 final stretch puppy to
child
pose 3 2 1 start walk your hands forward
lower your chest to the ground keep your
hips over knees feel the stretch through
your arms and back opening up the
shoulder blades and lengthening the
[Music]
spine 3 2 1 translit into child's pose
as you sit back this is deeply relaxing
for the whole body as well as the mind
take this time to connect and nurture
with yourself there's nowhere else to be
except right here right
now three 2 1 as we wrap up this routine
remember that each stretch is an act of
selflove thank yourself for taking this
time to nurture your body and mind feel
free to revisit this routine anytime you
need a moment of Peace whether in the
morning to start your day with Clarity
or at night to unwind and fine
Tranquility let's carry this calm
throughout our day
